creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly acquired by the Center with the kind assistance of Carol Brooks and Prof. James Cahill in honor of George Schlenker
description: mountain landscape with buildings, trees, and waterfall; tall mountains with horizontal lines indicating foliage at top; closely clustered buildings at center L; dense foliage at center; multi-tiered waterfall begins at center down towards LL; short bridge at lower center with figure crossing towards L; rocky embankments with dense foliage either side
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Seals, and Stickers

URC: {Gyokushu Kuwa Shisa} (Gyokushu So Shisan Utsutsu) (Copied by Gyokushu)
markings: URC: square intaglio: [Kuwain Shisan]; square intaglio: [Meifu]; sticker at L when rolled: [J16]; round white sticker L roller end: [SJ/16]; bright yellow sticker L roller end: [E5]
medium: Ink and light color on paper
title: Landscape with Fisherman Outside a Cave
